title: Managing Portfolio for Maximizing Alpha and Minimizing Beta. (arXiv:2304.05900v1 [q-fin.PM])
abstract: Portfolio management is an essential component of investment strategy that aims to maximize returns while minimizing risk. This paper explores several portfolio management strategies, including asset allocation, diversification, active management, and risk management, and their importance in optimizing portfolio performance. These strategies are examined individually and in combination to demonstrate how they can help investors maximize alpha and minimize beta. Asset allocation is the process of dividing a portfolio among different asset classes to achieve the desired level of risk and return. Diversification involves spreading investments across different securities and sectors to minimize the impact of individual security or sector-specific risks. Active management involves security selection and risk management techniques to generate excess returns while minimizing losses. translated_title: 最大化 Alpha 和最小化 Beta 的组合管理投资组合
translated_abstract: 投资组合管理是投资策略中至关重要的组成部分，旨在最大化回报同时最小化风险。本文研究了几种投资组合管理策略，包括资产配置、分散化、主动管理和风险管理，以及它们在优化投资组合表现中的重要性。这些策略分别和组合使用，以展示它们如何帮助投资者最大化 Alpha 和最小化 Beta。资产配置是将投资组合分配到不同的资产类别中，以实现所需的风险和回报水平。分散化是将投资分散到不同的证券和行业中，以最小化个别证券或特定行业风险的影响。主动管理涉及证券选择和风险管理技术，以产生超额回报并尽量减少亏损。风险管理策略，如止损指令和期权策略，旨在在不利情况下最小化损失。
tldr: 本文探讨了投资组合管理中的资产配置、分散化、主动管理和风险管理策略。这些策略可以单独或组合使用，最大化 Alpha 和最小化 Beta，以优化投资组合表现。
en_tdlr: This paper explores portfolio management strategies, including asset allocation, diversification, active management, and risk management, examining how these strategies can be used individually or in combination to maximize alpha and minimize beta, optimizing portfolio performance.
